name: node-modules
description: 1. Install the required packages     a) go to the /demo/node-modules directory in your terminal, e.g. : right click on "node-modules" folder, Open in Terminal     b) install the mime and shortid required packages :      npm i mime shortid 2. Run your application     a) go to the /demo/node-modules directory in your terminal, e.g. : right click on "node-modules" folder, Open in Terminal     b) run the main script : node node-modules.js
author: e-Baron
